hivis.data.view

Interface View

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    SeriesView<V>, TableView
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSeriesView, AbstractTableView, CalcSeries, CalcSeries.DoubleSeries, CalcSeries.DoubleSeries.Add, CalcSeries.DoubleSeries.AddSeries, CalcSeries.DoubleSeries.Divide, CalcSeries.DoubleSeries.DivideSeries, CalcSeries.DoubleSeries.Multiply, CalcSeries.DoubleSeries.MultiplySeries, CalcSeries.DoubleSeries.Subtract, CalcSeries.DoubleSeries.SubtractSeries, CalcSeries.FloatSeries, CalcSeries.FloatSeries.Add, CalcSeries.FloatSeries.AddSeries, CalcSeries.FloatSeries.Divide, CalcSeries.FloatSeries.DivideSeries, CalcSeries.FloatSeries.Multiply, CalcSeries.FloatSeries.MultiplySeries, CalcSeries.FloatSeries.Subtract, CalcSeries.FloatSeries.SubtractSeries, CalcSeries.IntSeries, CalcSeries.IntSeries.Add, CalcSeries.IntSeries.AddSeries, CalcSeries.IntSeries.Divide, CalcSeries.IntSeries.DivideSeries, CalcSeries.IntSeries.Multiply, CalcSeries.IntSeries.MultiplySeries, CalcSeries.IntSeries.Subtract, CalcSeries.IntSeries.SubtractSeries, CalcSeries.LongSeries, CalcSeries.LongSeries.Add, CalcSeries.LongSeries.AddSeries, CalcSeries.LongSeries.Divide, CalcSeries.LongSeries.DivideSeries, CalcSeries.LongSeries.Multiply, CalcSeries.LongSeries.MultiplySeries, CalcSeries.LongSeries.Subtract, CalcSeries.LongSeries.SubtractSeries, SeriesViewAppend, SeriesViewFunction, SeriesViewRow, TableViewAppend, TableViewFilterRows, TableViewFunction, TableViewSeries, TableViewSeriesBase, TableViewTranspose

    public interface View
    Interface for classes that present a view of some data.
    Author:
    O. J. Coleman

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void updateView(Object cause)
      Update this view.

    • Method Detail

      • updateView

        void updateView(Object cause)
        Update this view. If the view does not cache the view it presents then it may not be necessary to do anything in this method. Note that views based on a DataSet or subclasses thereof will generally update themselves automatically when the underlying DataSet changes. This method is for handling the case where the view is also affected by an external factor, such as parameters to a function that may change.
        Parameters:
        cause - Optional argument for specifying the reason for updating the view. Implementation specific.
